title: It's a travesty that Jhin can sit on his fourth shot for ten seconds
body: Make him automatically reload after four seconds of not attacking.

replies.body:
10 seconds isn't as much as you probably think. The thing is (and this was never fucking documented) that Jhin can refresh the timer by casting a spell. He can fire the third shot, wait 9 seconds, cast Q, wait 9 seconds, cast W, wait, etc.

Hell, Q has a 7 second CD  at rank 1. As long as he has a target to cast Q on he can sit on the fourth shot as long as his mana pool allows him to.
